name: @codefrau/squeakjs
description: Virtual Machine for Squeak Smalltalk and derivatives
author: Vanessa Freudenberg <vanessa@codefrau.net> (https://twitter.com/codefrau)

scripts.build:bundle: rollup squeak.js --file dist/squeak_bundle.js --format iife && rollup squeak_headless.js --file dist/squeak_headless_bundle.js
scripts.build:minify: uglifyjs dist/squeak_bundle.js -o dist/squeak_bundle.min.js -c -m --source-map && uglifyjs dist/squeak_headless_bundle.js -o dist/squeak_headless_bundle.min.js -c -m --source-map
scripts.build: npm run build:cleanup && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:minify
